org.usfirst.frc.team2791.robot.util

Class ShakerGyro

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
      • org.usfirst.frc.team2791.robot.util.ShakerGyro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ShakerGyro
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Custom utility for the ADXRS453 Gyro

    ***NOTE:*** WPI now has a compatible driver for the ADXRS354 Gyro, which we use
    Author:
    Max Llewellyn
